quantile(pbc2$year, probs = c(0, 0.05, 0.95, 1))

fm_1 <- gls(prothrombin ~ ns(year, 3, B = c(0, 9.3)) * (sex + drug) + age, 
            data = pbc2)

summary(fm_1)
